summary: LattePipeline coordinates a variational auto‑encoder, a frozen T5 text encoder, a tokenizer, a 3‑D transformer and a diffusion scheduler to turn natural‑language prompts into video sequences. It handles prompt preprocessing, latent preparation, diffusion denoising with classifier‑free guidance, and decoding of latent video frames back to pixel space.
business_intent: Provide an easy‑to‑use interface for developers and content creators to generate custom video clips from text, supporting applications such as advertising, entertainment, rapid prototyping of visual ideas, and AI‑augmented media production.
